results.title: Live, Laugh, Love (Giving You Annoying Cards). Funny Card for any occasion. Blank Inside, Friend, Brother, Sister, Humour, Joke, Quote.
results.description:
'LIVE, LAUGH, LOVE (GIVING YOU ANNOYING CARDS'

I bloody love the jokes surrounding the 'Live, Laugh, Love' quote. So much so, that I've pulled my finger out and done a card. It's blank inside so you can use it for any occasion you like.

WHAT YOU GET

1 x A6 sized card (105x148 mm) printed on quality 300gsm professionally pre-scored matte card (left blank inside for your own message) 
The card will be sealed in a cellophane sleeve, and is mailed out in a hard backed envelope to prevent damage.

SHIPPING

Cards are dispatched in 1-2 business days. UK postage is 1st class using Royal Mail. 

International orders are now sent using a Tracked & Signed service. There are no extra postal charges for more than one item.

Europe and Worldwide deliveries:
-For European destinations please allow 5-9 working days.
-For rest of the world please allow between 7-14 working days.
(you will receive an email notification from Etsy, with a delivery tracking number, when your order has been dispatched,)

***OFFERS***

Fancy getting a range of cards at the same time?

You can buy any 5 cards for £7,99 here https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/268757044/set-of-5-greetings-cards-multipack-offer?ref=shop_home_feat_1&frs=1
Or Any 10 cards for £13.99 here https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/245848060/set-of-10-greetings-cards-multipack?ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1
They come with Free UK delivery and you can mix and match any cards in the shop.

COPYRIGHT © 2015-2019 Offhand Cards

Please note that image rights are not transferred with the sale

results.title: Free Tart Live Laugh Love Fan Fragrance Warmer / Large Area Tart Warmer / Soy Wax Melts / Handmade / Spring Scents
results.description:
Circulates fragrance 3x farther and faster!

The message of "Live, Laugh, Love" on this ivory reactive glazed warmer keeps the important things in life in mind.

Fan Fragrance Warmers feature our patented fan that circulates a fragrant breeze into the air to fill larger spaces.
The warming plate quickly warms the dish to release the fragrance from scented wax melts.
The LED light in each Illuminaire creates the ambiance of a lit candle, without flame, soot, or other pollutants.

Simply place wax melts in the warming dish, turn it on, and enjoy your favorite fragrance as it spreads through the room.
————————————

This listing including tarts is for one (1) package | Each package contains six (6) cubes. 

———————————————————

•Fruit Loops - Do I really need to say more? 

•Iced Lemon Cookie - the perfect 
combination of sweet, buttery, lemon baked goodies!

•Bourbon Brew - A Hickory Hill exclusive. Beautiful mixture of KY bourbon with a hint of coffee! 

•Lavender Lemon - Sweet orange and tangy lemon peel add a bright 
twist to this beautiful floral creation. Fresh 
cut lavender is blended with hints of green for natural appeal while a base of orange flower and vanilla adds lingering sweetness.

•Blueberry Cobbler - A fruity creamy bouquet with a lactony sweet background

•Cantaloupe & Lily - This floral fuity mix is a must try. A great fragrance for all year round. 

•Raspberry Lemonade - Sweet raspberry blended with the crispness of lemonade makes for a wonder tangy mix.

•Honeysuckle - Fresh honeysuckle blend with hints of jasmine, rose, and lilac. 

•Watermelon Punch - Sugared watermelon gets natural sensations from a blend of green tones for the fragrance signature. A hint of berry finishes the blend.

•Clean Cotton - A strong aroma of freshly cleaned sheets 

•Apple Berry - Fruity green apple top notes with floral middle notes of Jasmine & Rose with sweet vanilla and cotton candy type bottom notes. 

•Mahogany Teakwood - A BBW dupe. 
Green, citrus and fruit top notes with floral notes of jasmine, rose and lily middle notes enhanced by sweet woody musky bottom notes.

•Strawberry Kiwi - Fresh green fruits blend of lime, kiwi, and sweet strawberry with great strength.


—————————————-
———————


These tart melts are made from a natural, soy wax. We can guarantee an environmentally friendly, clean burning tart melt that produces zero toxins into the air - unlike paraffin wax used in most tarts. Soy wax will also burn longer and slower than paraffin wax, meaning you are getting more bang for your buck! Tart melts are made in small batches in Corbin, KY and are hand poured into clamshell containers. Visit our shop to explore all our soy options!

Failure to follow these directions could result in unexpected fire hazard or personal injury. Use only in well ventilated low heat wax tart warmer without lid. Do not add water. Never heat on stove or electric appliance where temperature would exceed 190 degrees F. Melt enough product to have 1/2 inch of product in pot. Use only in warmers designed for wax tarts.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Recycled Green Wine Bottle Windchime
results.description:
>>>This chime is made from a recycled green liter size  wine bottle, hand cut & sanded smooth.

>>>The top is recorked from a recycled cork with a loop at each end in which to hang it. Beads are strung down the middle followed by a wooden ball, a recycled beer cap & 3 beads.

>>>The lettering is vinyl. 

>>>The tail is hand cut from metal with a hole in the center and hammered around the edges for a smoother finish.


Great gift for your wine lover!
Please email me with any questions.
Thanks for shopping!

results.title: Pillow Cover, Live, Laugh, Love Pillow Cover, Browns, Blues, And Pale Green, 18 x 18 inches
results.description:
This whimsical pillow cover features the words, "Live, Laugh, Love" in shades of brown, blue, and pale green, all on a white background.  It pairs beautifully with the paisley print pillow shown.  It is available in 18 x 18 inches and the back features the same fabric as the front.  My pillow covers have an envelope closure in the back so covers can be easily changed for laundering or to update your decor's color theme.   Pillow forms can be purchased at any fabric or craft store, or any Walmart.  Finished size will be approximately 1/2" smaller to ensure a good fit on your pillow form.

All stress points have been double and triple stitched  for wear and all edges have been serged to prevent fraying.  

Dry cleaning is recommended for this fabric.  Fabric: 100% medium weight cotton.

All my pillows covers are constructed in a smoke-free environment.

results.title: Personalized Cutting Board - Live Laugh Love - Corporate, Wedding, House Warming, Chef or Self Gift
results.description:
This beautiful custom engraved cutting board is the perfect gift for almost any occasion! Whether this is a gift for a wedding, housewarming or holiday this personalized cutting board is sure to be cherished for years to come! Many style choices available so the possibilities for customization are endless - add any name, date or even your own logo!Personalized Cutting Board - Live Laugh Love - Corporate, Wedding, House Warming, Chef or Self Gift

Wood Species: Cherry, Maple and Walnut
Size: 12 x 9 x 0.75 inches
Size: 30 x 23 x 2 centimeters
Design: Live Laugh Love
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
► ABOUT THE CUTTING BOARD
Each board is  engraved with a different design. It is finished with food safe cutting board conditioning oil.
Due to the nature of the wood grains, every cutting board  wood grain will vary slightly from the items shown in the pictures for example lighter wood types will provide more contrast in comparison to darker woods.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
► WANT TO MAKE IT SPECIAL?
We offer personalization service for FREE on this item, where your text, quote or logo will be engraved on the cutting board. The personalization is added to the board without removing the original design. Make it a very special gift for any occasion: birthdays, yourself, baby showers, bridal showers, anniversaries, engagement, Valentine's day, Christmas, family reunions, graduations or as thank you gifts or get well gifts as well! The information will be copied and pasted into the design, therefore, provide exactly what you want to see on the board. We will not be guessing the spelling, single/ plural forms, commas, apostrophe and other punctuation use.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
► SHOP POLICIES:
* There are no returns or refunds on custom orders or customized products, unless there was an error on our part.
* It is your responsibility to provide us with accurate customization information within 3 days of purchase. Otherwise, we'll ship the product without customization and we'll refund the customization fee. There will be no refunds or returns because of this.
* We take great care packaging every item to ensure safe quality shipping.
* We ship via USPS. All shipments are sent out within the timing frame specified on the listing. We ship world wide, but we are not responsible for any charges stipulated by any Customs Agency.
* Please make sure to provide the correct shipping address when placing your order, orders will be shipped out to the shipping address provided.
* Transit time varies and depends on the carrier, we cannot be held responsible for delays caused by carriers.
* We are not responsible for delivery errors made by USPS, once the package is shipped, it is the responsibility of the customer to track the order.
* We are not responsible for charges made at the customs office of any country. The buyer is assumed to have researched import/export fees before buying.
* Products purchased with a promotional code or during a sale are final and there are no returns or refunds.
* Custom made products are non-refundable, unless the product is damaged or incorrect. 
* We will take authorized returns within 14 days after delivery. Returns will only be approved if the item was damaged or is different from the product's description.
* If a package is returned to us as ""not claimed"", ""unable to deliver"", ""address invalid"" or anything similar, we will not refund it. The buyer will have to pay for shipment again and we will ship it out as soon as we receive payment.
* All custom made order are non-refundable and non-returnable unless the item is damaged or incorrect in any way.

results.description:
Live, Laugh, Love. If that doesn't work, Load, Aim & Fire.

This decal can be placed on a side window, rear window, mirror, laptop, cooler or any other hard, smooth non-porous surface.

Decals are created using high quality commercial grade adhesive glossy vinyl that is made to withstand outdoor weather conditions for 6 years.

This decal is NOT a window cling. It is removable but it is NOT reusable. This is a one time use decal.

Decals are easy to apply. Each one comes with the transfer paper already applied and a set of instructions to make the application process a breeze!

This decal measures 7" x 3.5"

Other color options and sizes are available upon request. Feel free to message me with any questions!

Thank you for shopping the Sweet Sarcasm Designs!!!

results.title: Stainless Steel Personalized Sweet 16 Birthday Bangle Bracelet with Birthstone Charm, Custom Initial, Live Laugh Love Engraved Charm
results.description:
Happy Sweet 16 Birthday Bangle Charm Bracelet is custom made!  The perfect personalized gift to celebrate this milestone birthday for your daughter, best friend, granddaughter, niece, etc!

Bracelet includes the following:
•Sweet 16 engraved charm
•Live Laugh Love engraved charm
•Initial charm
•Swarovski Birthstone Charm

The engraved charms are made from high-quality stainless steel, the lettering is laser engraved and will not fade, approximately 19x22mm.  Bracelet is about 60mm which is an average bracelet length of 7.5 inches and can be adjusted slightly larger or smaller. 

STAINLESS STEEL: The chain, charms and jump rings are all made of surgical grade stainless steel. Stainless steel is not only beautiful, but an affordable choice. Stainless steel is hypoallergenic, will not rust, change color or tarnish. Jewelry crafted with it can be treasured for a lifetime due to its durability. While stainless steel is a very durable metal, it is recommended that it be cleaned with a very soft, lint free, nonabrasive cloth. 

Please allow approximately one week to make your order plus applicable shipping time. 

CARE INSTRUCTIONS: 
: Remove before bathing, swimming and water activities. Water resistant but not water proof.
: Choking Hazard, Small Parts - Not recommended for young children.

Handmade in the USA by Little Gem Girl. 2011 All Rights Reserved © Text & Photos / Little Gem Girl
